name: openldap-admin
description: phpLDAPadmin is a web-based LDAP client. It provides easy, anywhere-accessible, multi-language administration for your LDAP server.
preInstallNotes:
In order for Open LDAP Admin service to start successfully it requires atleast 0.1 CPU and 128MB of RAM including ports. WARNING: OpenLDAP Admin on DCOS is currently in ALPHA. There may be bugs, incomplete
features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies.
postUninstallNotes: OpenLDAP Admin has been uninstalled. Note that any data persisted to a NFS share still exists and will need to be manually removed.
